title: India stocks lower at close of trade; Nifty 50 down 1.69%
text:
© Reuters. India stocks lower at close of trade; Nifty 50 down 1.69%

Investing.com – India stocks were lower after the close on Tuesday, as losses in the , and sectors led shares lower.

At the close in NSE, the fell 1.69%, while the index fell 1.73%.

The best performers of the session on the were GAIL Ltd (NS: ), which rose 1.85% or 2.40 points to trade at 131.90 at the close. Meanwhile, Titan Company Ltd (NS: ) added 0.98% or 11.20 points to end at 1158.25 and Hindustan Unilever Ltd. (NS: ) was up 0.97% or 17.70 points to 1831.20 in late trade.

The worst performers of the session were Hero MotoCorp Ltd (NS: ), which fell 6.25% or 171.05 points to trade at 2568.95 at the close. Tata Motors Ltd (NS: ) declined 4.98% or 6.40 points to end at 122.00 and AXIS Bank Ltd (NS: ) was down 4.68% or 31.40 points to 640.45.

The top performers on the BSE Sensex 30 were Hindustan Unilever Ltd. (BO: ) which rose 0.84% to 1830.95, Asian Paints Ltd. (BO: ) which was up 0.59% to settle at 1529.45 and Infosys Ltd (BO: ) which gained 0.44% to close at 831.05.

The worst performers were Hero MotoCorp Ltd (BO: ) which was down 6.19% to 2570.05 in late trade, Tata Motors Ltd (BO: ) which lost 5.13% to settle at 121.95 and Tata Motors Ltd DVR (BO: ) which was down 4.66% to 56.25 at the close.

Falling stocks outnumbered advancing ones on the India National Stock Exchange by 1152 to 411 and 73 ended unchanged; on the Bombay Stock Exchange, 1594 fell and 818 advanced, while 136 ended unchanged.

The , which measures the implied volatility of Nifty 50 options, was up 7.12% to 16.0175.

Gold Futures for December delivery was down 0.47% or 7.05 to $1504.45 a troy ounce. Elsewhere in commodities trading, Crude oil for delivery in November fell 1.55% or 0.97 to hit $61.70 a barrel, while the November Brent oil contract fell 1.59% or 1.10 to trade at $67.92 a barrel.

USD/INR was up 0.44% to 71.877, while EUR/INR rose 0.62% to 79.2020.

The US Dollar Index Futures was down 0.01% at 98.167.
